name: Fly you fools!
description:
Before starting get a friend, choose your role - mapper or explorer.  The mapper will see all hidden traps and with good communication between the two player you might even get out in one pice. Starting from level 2 you'll encounter new enemies...

What might they be!

Help - This is a co-op game with two roles. Explorer who moves the character and mapper who has information about the level. There are hidden traps which only the mapper sees. Each level you have 3 hp, try to not kill yourself. Communicate through the level to reach the finale. Have fun. 

Standard controls
W - up | A - left | S - down | D - right
